sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for classic and skate ski today, March 1, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Due to the warm, rainy weather, trails have deteriorated and are not suitable for skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Well groomed, pretty hard packed and FAST from the rain & warm weather causing it to re-freeze. Good coverage

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lovely blue sky Spring skiing on the Red and Blue loops today . Surprisingly little wind debris . The trail and groom is holding well.  The skate had a bit of suck : but I had rilled and LF 8 worked well.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 6 lifts, the Space Worm, and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Saturday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Welcome to a beautiful ski day. The temperature is forecast to reach the mid-20's and sunshine is predicted in the afternoon. The snow surface is machine groomed and continues to be in good shape even after the freeze and thaw cycle. The HEAD-2-HEAD race is on JB Arena at 10 AM this morning. The knock-out bracket round begins at noon and will feature some thrilling dual paneled slalom racing that is great for spectators. No NASTAR racing today due to the HEAD-2-HEAD race. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
